es.ucm.fdi.ici.fsm

Class FSMObservable

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.ici.fsm.FSMObservable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FSM

    public class FSMObservable
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the methods required to notify FSM events. Thus, FSM class will inherit this one. Allow to register FSMObservers and notify the method defined in that interface.
    Author:
    Juan Ant. Recio Garc√≠a - Universidad Complutense de Madrid
